parameters.name: Mode
parameters.description: Document type as defined in swDocumentTypes_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: TemplateName
parameters.description: Name of custom template including full directory path

parameters.name: PaperSize
parameters.description: Size of paper as defined in swDwgPaperSizes_e

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: Width of paper; used only when paperSize is swDwgPapersUserDefined

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description: Height of paper; used only when paperSize is swDwgPapersUserDefined

title: ISldWorks.GetDocumentTemplate
description: Gets the name of document template that can be used in ISldWorks::NewDocument or ISldWorks::INewDocument2.
signature:
System.String GetDocumentTemplate( 
   System.Int32
Mode
,
   System.String
TemplateName
,
   System.Int32
PaperSize
,
   System.Double
Width
,
   System.Double
Height
)

parameters.name: Mode
parameters.description: Document type as defined in swDocumentTypes_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: TemplateName
parameters.description: Name of custom template including full directory path

parameters.name: PaperSize
parameters.description: Size of paper as defined in swDwgPaperSizes_e

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: Width of paper; used only when paperSize is swDwgPapersUserDefined

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description: Height of paper; used only when paperSize is swDwgPapersUserDefined

returns: Name of the selected document template
remarks:
If type is...
Then...
swDocPART or swDocASSEMBLY
Remaining arguments are not used.
swDocDRAWING
Remaining arguments are used to determine which drawing template to use.

examples.title: Get Locations and Names of Document Templates (VBA)
